desc: One of a kind handmade quilts, unique contemporary quilt patterns, online classes for beginner quilters, intermediate quilters, and advanced quilters. Unique items for your sewing studio. Meditative quilting. Piecing for pleasure. English paper piecing. Sewing tips and tricks. Sewing for accuracy.

layout.text: Make unique quilts that speak to who you are, express your personality, tell your story using your own curated fabric one beautiful piece at a time. Create an heirloom quality quilt with confidence. Join me in my sewing studio to find your path to your creative style and create something beautiful that says, "I made this!", and let your story unfold.
